component.description: EnrollSchedule is a component inheriting from Schedule that allows you to easily organize and manage various enrollment events.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false org.primefaces.model.EnrollScheduleModel An org.primefaces.model.ScheduleModel instance representing the backed model.
locale false java.lang.Object Locale for localization, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.
aspectRatio false java.lang.Double java.lang.Double.MIN_VALUE Ratio of calendar width to height, higher the value shorter the height is.
view false java.lang.String month The view type to use, possible values are 'month', 'agendaDay', 'agendaWeek', 'basicWeek', 'basicDay'. Default is month.
initialDate false java.lang.Object The initial date that is used when schedule loads. If ommitted, the schedule starts on the current date.
showWeekends false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies inclusion Saturday/Sunday columns in any of the views. Default is true.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of schedule.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element of schedule.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true When true, events are draggable. Default is true.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true When true, events are resizable. Default is true.
showHeader false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of header content. Default is true.
leftHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String prev,next today Content of left side of header. Default is "prev, next today"
centerHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String title Content of center of header. Default is title.
rightHeaderTemplate false java.lang.String month,agendaWeek,agendaDay Content of right side of header. Default is "month, agendaWeek, agendaDay"
allDaySlot false java.lang.Boolean true Determines if all-day slot will be displayed in agendaWeek or agendaDay views. Default is true.
slotMinutes false java.lang.Integer 15 Interval in minutes in an hour to create a slot. Default is 15.
firstHour false java.lang.Integer 6 First hour to display in day view. Default is 6.
minTime false java.lang.String Minimum time to display in a day view.
maxTime false java.lang.String Maximum time to display in a day view.
axisFormat false java.lang.String Determines the time-text that will be displayed on the vertical axis of the agenda views.
timeFormat false java.lang.String Determines the time-text that will be displayed on each event.
timeZone false java.lang.Object String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion, defaults to TimeZone.getDefault()
periodic false java.lang.Boolean true Determines if the ongoing enrollment is periodic or a single event (such as an exam). Defaults to true.
autoColor false java.lang.Boolean false If set to true, component will automatically adjust events background colors
autoOpacity false java.lang.Boolean false If set to true, component will automatically adjust events opacity to reflect their importance
